items.sentence: What surprised me most was that she didn\'t like candy.
I thought we weren\'t supposed to go there without Tom.
Tom admitted that he had made a mistake and apologized.
Tom didn\'t answer because he didn\'t know what to say.
I\'m going to make you an offer that you can\'t refuse.
I\'m going to tell them that I won\'t be there on time.
Don\'t pretend you don\'t know what I\'m talking about.
It\'s getting late and I have to get up early tomorrow.
It\'s obvious that Tom is just pretending to be asleep.
It\'s easy to understand why Tom doesn\'t like it here.
